title: Short-Term Workshop on Elementary Science Instructional Design for Online Transition

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening the ability to transition to online education using mobile microlearning in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for producing and sharing science experiment videos using mobile devices
Learners complete student-centered online lesson designs using smartphone-based collaborative tools (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet)
Learners present at least three project-based assessment criteria and apply digital portfolio creation methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
